title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments:
My three recos for the thread:  
- 'Love Letter' by ODESZA. Love how this dance track begins.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BhbchgBlUPI  
- 'You Should Probably Leave' by Chris Stapleton. Some country rock for a change.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M-MGpJIo2bs  
- 'Requiem' by Ben Abraham. Interesting performance video where just the vocals are live.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ub8Ul2IRoZc
If you ever want to shake your soul with despair and loss then listen to Dance with the Devil by Immortal Technique.

New track by deadmau5 and kaskade.
Very deadmau5 and very kaskade i.e. very very good!
https://youtu.be/BMFNN40fNp0

[Bonobo- Shadows](https://youtu.be/mzj927xUG3I)

[Bonobo- Otomo](https://youtu.be/39NfSiXXgcE)

[The idles- Never fight a man with a perm](https://youtu.be/dEe4i2osF5A)

[Baths- Animals](https://youtu.be/mZeDNb5l08o)
Ah fellow metalhead. Did ya get check out the new stuff by ERRA?
Yep, their new album is awesome
